name: Helpr Agent – the proper solution for your issues
author: PixelDrops

sections.description:
Just one click away to get the proper assistance for your WordPress website.

Helpr Agent was built to keep in touch with your developer.
If you or your customers needs help while working with WordPress, this plugin will be there to send the request. Right there. Just type your issue or your questions and the emails are sent straight from your WordPress dashboard. No call, no text, no complicated forms, nu other windows opened. Just one click.
That’s help desk at it’s best.

The request gets to you within seconds.

If you are a developer you can add this plugin and let the owner of the website to run his business. Every time when he will need help, Helpr Agent will sent the emails and you can reply back.
It can be a useful tool for all kind of persons, developers or not.

Feedback

Please let us know your feedback about Helpr Agent so we can use it in future versions and to improve our product.

Support

Do you have a question or do you need help? Please feel free to contact us

Further Reading
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin in Settings >Helpr Agent (you will be prompted to that page)
  4. Press the “Request Help” tab from WordPress Dashboard
  5. Send the request
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin in Settings >Helpr Agent (you will be prompted to that page)
  4. Press the “Request Help” tab from WordPress Dashboard
  5. Send the request

short_description: Helpr Agent helps agencies to improve their customer service and to increase their sales through their WordPress projects.
